price: Dia menurunkan para malaikat dengan (membawa) wahyu dengan perintah-Nya kepada siapa yang Dia kehendaki di antara hamba-hamba-Nya, yaitu, "Peringatkanlah olehmu sekalian, bahwasanya tidak ada Tuhan (yang hak) melainkan Aku, maka hendaklah kamu bertakwa kepada-Ku".
arabic: يُنَزِّلُ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةَ بِٱلرُّوحِ مِنۡ أَمۡرِهِۦ عَلَىٰ مَن يَشَآءُ مِنۡ عِبَادِهِۦٓ أَنۡ أَنذِرُوٓاْ أَنَّهُۥ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّآ أَنَا۠ فَٱتَّقُونِ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yunazzilu al-malāikata bil-rūḥi min amrihi ʿalā man yashāu min ʿibādihi an andhirū annahu lā ilāha illā anā fa-ittaqūni
